title: "R Notebook"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
x <- read.csv("summary_stats_1000_curves.csv")
```



```{r}
hist(x$mean[c(1:1000)], main="Histogram of means of x-coordinates", xlab = "Means")
```

```{r}
hist(x$mean[(1001:2000)], main="Histogram of means of y-coordinates", xlab = "Means")
```

```{r}
hist(x$mean[(2001:3000)], main="Histogram of means of speed", xlab = "Means")
```
```{r}
summary(x$mean[(3001:4000)])

hist(x$mean[(3001:4000)], main="Histogram of means of curvature", xlab = "Means", xlim=range(0,500), breaks = 1000)

hist(log(x$mean[(3001:4000)]), main="Histogram of log means of curvature", xlab = "Means")

boxplot(log(x$mean[(3001:4000)]))

a <- "No. of means greater than 500:"
outliers <- sum(x$X=="CURVATURE" & x$mean > 500)
print(paste(a,outliers))
```

```{r}
kruskal.test(, data = x)
```
